Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: We're here. This is the summit.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: It's quite a different atmosphere from the torii maze...

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Look. The real black torii is over there.

Name: Putra
Phrase: You're right! The pitch-black torii gate... is a bit scary.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: It's quite big compared to the red torii. I don't think I've ever seen a pitch-black torii before.

Name: Putra
Phrase: Come to think of it, why are so many Nishikese torii red? It would be nice if there's blue or green ones.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Red has the effect of purifying bad things. Many torii in sacred sites are painted red.

Name: Putra
Phrase: I didn't realise it had such a meaning. So a black torii gate doesn't have the effect of driving away bad things?

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: I think so, judging at the state of disrepair here. The amount of magic is also very different. No wonder there's such a thick Mist.

Name: Fox Masked Girl
Phrase: Sooner or later the Mist will be a thicker. Help the lord of this mountain before that happens.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: There she is!

Name: Fox Masked Girl
Phrase: Thank you for coming. Thank you for finding the black torii.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Thank you, too, for telling us all this.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: What is that black torii? It seems to be the source of the Phantom Mist. How can we calm it down?

Name: Fox Masked Girl
Phrase: That torii is a Gate. Something was forced to open it from somewhere else. It tried to take the sick children to itself.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: But it didn't work. The lord of the mountain protected them.

Name: Fox Masked Girl
Phrase: That's right. The lord of the mountain confronted the inviting thing from beyond the Gate. As a result, the barrier of the torii was disturbed, creating a massive Phantom Mist.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: So there is such a powerful enemy behind this torii.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: That's the one who put the curse on Yoshino, isn't it?

Name: Fox Masked Girl
Phrase: 'Yes. From a distance, he placed a curse only on Yoshino. A strong, deep-seated, difficult-to-remove curse.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: It turned out just as Miss Miyako said. Whoever that tried to take the children from another place that is not here, and the lord of the mountain who tried to stop it clashed with it...

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Wait a minute. A curse that is difficult to remove... So you're saying there's still a curse inside Yoshino?

Name: Fox Masked Girl
Phrase: Don't worry about that. Because Miyako received the curse now.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: 'Miyako received...?'

Name: Miyako
Phrase: 'It was after Yoshino-chan jumped into the water. At first I couldn't do anything about it, but after I entered that strange space called Ningyou Jigoku... I somehow managed to get a little bit of the curse.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Please don't do anything dangerous for Yoshino...

Name: Miyako
Phrase: But if I had left you like that, Yoshino-chan wouldn't be here anymore. You would have been taken beyond the Gate, or worse, you would have died.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: It's a miracle that I was able to get the curse. If I try it once and it doesn't work, it usually doesn't work anymore.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: But there was something protecting Yoshino-chan in that place. Thanks to that power, I was able to save Yoshino-chan...

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: If that miracle had not happened, Miyako might have died too. Yoshino cares for Yoshino, and similarly Miyako should also care for Miyako.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Yoshino is sad. Yoshino wants Miyako to take better care of herself.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: It's good to work hard for someone else. But you don't have to take someone else's place.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Miyako is not a 'migawari'. You don't have to get sick or be cursed.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: I don't get diseases anyway. I'm just receiving curses.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Why? Why would you do that, Miyako?

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Because it's something only I can do. I receive curses from people. To make people like dolls more...

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Don't call them 'defective'. They all just want people to care about them.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Miyako?

Name: Miyako
Phrase: They grow their hair long, because they want you to run a comb through it; They want to be held and played with, so they tripped on purpose.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: They make noises, because they want you to listen to their song; They make noises, because they want you to look at them.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: They're secretly fighting on their own in the dark, to keep bad things away from you.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Everything they do is for the people they love.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: I'm sorry. When I am afflicted with a strong curse, sometimes I remember my past...

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: 'It's okay. Don't be so hard on yourself.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Miyako is not alone. Miyako and Yoshino are friends. When you are in trouble, we can help each other.

Name: Fox Masked Girl
Phrase: The lord of the mountain sensed it. Miyako's magic power summoned the Mist.

Name: Fox Masked Girl
Phrase: Calm the lord of the mountain. Beyond the Gate is Hinayashiki. The lord of the house and the live dolls are waiting for you...

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Wait! What did you mean just now?

Name: Fox Masked Girl
Phrase: This is something only Miyako can do. Go through the Gate and help oka-san.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Oka-san is... Don't tell me, she's the doll from Hinayashiki?

Name: Miyako
Phrase: So that's what this is all about. This Mist, the nagashi-bina, the children... It was all her doing...
I'll guard the gate. The children must escape out of the maze...

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Mist Monster!

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Could this be the lord of the mountain...?
The kidnappers are coming from behind the black torii. Let the children go...

Name: Queensway
Phrase: He is deranged. Unfortunately, he has already turned into a monster.

Name: Putra
Phrase: 'Let's calm him down. If we don't, the Phantom Mist will spread to the foothills.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: You are a great guardian of the mountain. Thanks to you, many people have been saved.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Thank you for saving the children. Thank you for curing the sick.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: May Jushin-sama bless you.
